cca.rule.NoBatSpawn.name: NoBatSpawn
Modify the output logic of the comparator detection ShulkerBox
The number of inventory occupied is the number output!
cca.rule.ShulkerBoxPowerOutputExpansionC: Specifies the color of the ShulkerBox in effect for the Shulker Box Power Output Expansion(Pink by default).
cca.rule.EndermanCannotPickUpBlocksInNet: Protect your nether terrain from being destroyed by Enderman and prevent a large number of Endermen from not despawning after picking up blocks.
